articles.title: North-South Reunion of Separated Families, Relatives Held
articles.content:
North-South Reunion of Separated Families, Relatives Held
 Mt. Kumgang Resort, February 22 (KCNA) -- The reunion of separated families and relatives from the north and the south started in Mt. Kumgang Resort from Thursday. Families and relatives from the north side met their kith and kin from the south side. 
					 Those from the north said that all the people in the north are leading a happy life as a great harmonious family under the care of supreme leader Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 They talked about their worthwhile days of devoted services rendered for the prosperity of the country. They said not only themselves but also all their family members are making contributions to the building of a thriving socialist nation, always remembering the loving care shown by the benevolent country. 
					
					 The Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of Korea hosted a reception for those families and relatives from the north and the south. 
					
					 They bid farewell to their kith and kin from the south side on Saturday. 
					
					 Feeling regretful at parting, they promised each other to make positive efforts to bring earlier the reunification of the country under the banner of By Our Nation Itself. 
					
					 From Sunday separated families and relatives from the north side are expected to have a reunion with their kith and kin from the south side.

articles.title: Lists of Voters Displayed at Constituencies, Sub-constituencies
articles.content:
Lists of Voters Displayed at Constituencies, Sub-constituencies
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Lists of voters were displayed at the constituencies and sub-constituencies for the election of deputies to the 13th Supreme People's Assembly across the country. 
					 All citizens with suffrage residing in the relevant areas are registered in the lists of voters worked out according to the Rules on the Elections of Deputies to People's Assemblies at All Levels of the DPRK.
					
					 Voters are confirming the accuracy of their names registered.

articles.title: Delegation of Koreans in Japan Leaves
articles.content:
Delegation of Koreans in Japan Leaves
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The delegation of Koreans in Japan for celebrating the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star) headed by Hong In Hum, chairman of the Central Audit Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, left Pyongyang Saturday.

articles.title: Chinese Ministry of Culture Hosts Reception
articles.content:
Chinese Ministry of Culture Hosts Reception
 Beijing, February 20 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Culture of China hosted a reception in Beijing on February 20 on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the conclusion of agreements on cultural cooperation and air transportation between the governments of the DPRK and China.
					 Present there on invitation were Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and his embassy members.
					
					 Present there were officials of the Ministry of Culture, Ministry of Foreign Affairs and the International Liaison Department of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of China and other officials concerned.

articles.title: Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing
articles.content:
Reception Given at DPRK Embassy in Beijing 
 Beijing, February 21 (KCNA) -- The DPRK embassy in Beijing gave a reception on Friday on the occasion of the 55th anniversary of the conclusion of the agreements on cultural cooperation and air transportation between the governments of the DPRK and the People's Republic of China.
					 Present there on invitation were Ding Wei, vice-minister of Culture of China, a vice department director of the Administration of Civil Aviation of China, and other Chinese officials concerned.
					
					 Ji Jae Ryong, DPRK ambassador to China, and staff members of his embassy were present there.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: Participants in Conference of Ideological Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of the Sun
articles.content:
Participants in Conference of Ideological Officials Visit Kumsusan Palace of the Sun
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 8th Conference of Ideological Officials of the Workers' Party of Korea visited the Kumsusan Palace of the Sun Saturday.
					 They paid high tribute to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 They entered the halls where Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il lie in state and paid homage to them in humble reverence.
					
					 They went round the halls where orders Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il received are on display and the halls which house cars, an electric car, a boat and train coaches used by them during their field guidance and foreign tours till the last moments of their lives.

articles.title: Measures against Foot-and-Mouth Disease Taken in DPRK
articles.content:
Measures against Foot-and-Mouth Disease Taken in DPRK
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Foot-and-mouth disease (FMD) occurred in the DPRK.
					 According to Ri Kyong Gun, director of the Ministry of Agriculture, the disease broke out at the Pyongyang Pig Factory in Sadong District, Pyongyang on January 8 and has spread to 17 units in Pyongyang and Junghwa County of North Hwanghae Province as of now.
					
					 At least 3,200 pigs were infected by FMD type O, more than 360 of them died and over 2,900 of them were butchered, causing lots of economic damage.
					
					 In this regard, the National Veterinary Emergency Control Committee was organized and emergency was declared across the country.
					
					 The infected areas are quarantined and disinfected, the diseased pigs are treated and the dead ones are buried.
					
					 However, the disease continues spreading due to the shortages of FMD vaccines, diagnostic means and disinfection medicines.

articles.title: "Korea-Japan Protocol", Illegal Document Forced by Japan
articles.content:
"Korea-Japan Protocol", Illegal Document Forced by Japan
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- History witnesses that Japan, ambitious of invading Korea from long ago, cooked up numerous illegal documents by gangster-like means to make Korea its colony.
					 Among those documents is the "Korea-Japan Protocol".
					
					 In the end of 1903 when the relations between Czarist Russia and Japan were strained, the then Japanese diplomatic minister to Korea put pressure on the Emperor of the Feudal Joson Dynasty (1392-1910) to discontinue ties with Russia and discuss measures for improving relations of "friendship and cooperation" with Japan. 
					
					 As the Emperor gave him no answer, he bribed, intimidated and blackmailed some officials of the feudal dynasty, while concluding a "secret agreement" with one of them. Though the "agreement" contained some rhetoric like "independence, preservation of territorial integrity and mutual cooperation", it, in its essence, was an unequal agreement aimed at obliging Korea to stand by Japan's side in case the Japanese imperialists provoke a war against Russia with Korea as a battlefield and thus bringing Korea under its colonial rule. But the Feudal Joson Dynasty rejected the illegal "agreement". 
					
					 With the outbreak of Russo-Japanese War as an opportunity, the Japanese imperialists became evermore frantic in their moves to realize their policy of domination over Korea. After dislodging pro-Russian elements from the power machine of the dynasty, they made military threats to the dynasty to agree the "Korea-Japan Protocol" on Feb. 23, 1904.
					
					 Due to the protocol, Japan's interference into internal affairs of Korea was put on a legal basis. It stipulated that in case the feudal dynasty was "threatened" by rebellion or a third country, Japan would take immediate military action and the feudal dynasty had to allow the Japanese imperial army to stage military operations in its territory together with all support to it.
					
					 The agreement of the protocol by coercive means gives a glimpse of the Japanese aggressors' moves for putting the whole Korea under its control.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Exposes US Real Intention to Stage Military Exercises
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Exposes US Real Intention to Stage Military Exercises
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The U.S. is going to start Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises in south Korea on Monday and hurl huge troops and latest war hardware including nuclear submarines into the drills while steering them.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in an article in this regard:
					
					 Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises targeting the DPRK are the grave military provocation escalating the confrontation and tensions on the Korean peninsula and checking the improvement of the north-south relations and progress of the cause of national reunification.
					
					 This time, too, the U.S. is trying hard to cover the provocative nature and danger of the above-said exercises while advertising them as "annual" ones and "drills putting focus on defense".
					
					 It is talking about "support" to improved inter-Korean relations. It "hailed" the reunion of separated families and their relatives between the north and the south.
					
					 The U.S. secretary of State, who recently visited south Korea, insistently told the south Korean authorities that the exercises should be staged as planned. This is not only a deliberate ploy to ruin the opportunity for mending the north-south ties created by sincere efforts of the DPRK but also a coarse pressure for making the south Korean authorities not to opt for mending the relations with the DPRK. It is also a vicious challenge to the sincere efforts of the DPRK to ensure the detente and peace on the Korean peninsula and achieve the independent reunification, peace and prosperity by the concerted efforts of Koreans.
					
					 All Koreans in the north, the south and abroad should not allow the moves of warmongers at home and abroad who are persistently resorting to the war racket against the DPRK but check and frustrate them by dint of unity, the article concluded.

articles.title: University Prof. Sentenced to Jail Term
articles.content:
University Prof. Sentenced to Jail Term
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- A professor at Ulsan University was sentenced to a prison term on the charge of violation of the "security law" at the Ulsan District Court of south Korea on Feb. 20, according to south Korean CBS. 
					 The court meted out such punishment to the professor for the mere reason that he let students read the reminiscences of President Kim Il Sung "With the Century" and give their impressions of the book.

articles.title: Cancellation of War Drills Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Cancellation of War Drills Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- There took place an emergency seminar on the situation in Seoul on Feb. 19 under the sponsorship of the south Korean People's Action for Achieving Peace against War, according to the south Korean internet paper Thongil News.
					 Present there were representatives of political parties and civic and social organizations of south Korea including the Unified Progressive Party, South Headquarters of the Pan-national Alliance for Korea's Reunification, Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy, Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty, Solidarity for Progress, Women's Solidarity and the Youth Solidarity.
					
					 At the seminar speakers said that in order to turn the confrontational north-south relations into the ones of reconciliation and cooperation, it is necessary for the south Korean authorities to totally stop slandering the other side and all military hostile acts including the projected military drills with the U.S.
					
					 A statement was read out there.
					
					 The statement accused the south Korean authorities of openly revealing their wild ambition to "collapse" the other side while crying out for the "unification under the liberal democratic system" and, at the same time, of planning to stage large-scale joint military exercises.
					
					 It urged the authorities to terminate all the politically-motivated and military acts of antagonizing the other side and opt for mending inter-Korean relations and ensuring peace.
					
					 It also demanded them actively pave the way for peace and reunification through the lift of the "May 24 step", resumption of the tour of Mt. Kumgang, dialogues with the north and NGO exchanges.
					
					 It urged the U.S. to opt for achieving peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 It is necessary to cancel the projected joint military drills targeting the north, to begin with, as it will escalate the military tensions, the statement noted.
					
					 It called on people of various circles to make every possible effort to defuse the danger of war, mend inter-Korean relations and achieve peace on the peninsula.

articles.title: IS's Fabrication of Plotted Rebellion Case Denounced in S. Korea
articles.content:
IS's Fabrication of Plotted Rebellion Case Denounced in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Measure Committee to Denounce the Intelligence Service's Fabrication of Plotted Rebellion and Suppression under the Pretext of Security held a press conference in Seoul Tuesday denouncing the plotted rebellion case cooked up by the Intelligence Service (IS).
					 Speakers termed the decision of the court against Ri Sok Gi, a lawmaker from the Unified Progressive Party, a politically-motivated one made at a beck and call of power.
					
					 The prosecution brought a suit against him to the court as intended by the IS and the court meekly accepted it and sentenced him to heavy penalties, they said, adding the case was faked up by the IS to tide over its crisis caused by its interference in the election.
					
					 The decision reveals the politically-motivated purpose of the regime to disband the progressive party, they noted.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Call for Probing Truth behind Cases of Massacre of Civilians
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Call for Probing Truth behind Cases of Massacre of Civilians
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Various organizations of south Korea including the Institute for National Studies on Tuesday formed a joint survey group in Seoul for discovering the remains of the civilians massacred during the past Korean war, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 At an inaugural press conference speakers recalled that the Syngman Rhee regime massacred innocent civilians and buried them during the war, adding it is very unimaginable that no measure has been taken to settle it.
					
					 They said they decided to stage actions for reinstating those innocent victims and their descendents.
					
					 A declaration was read out at the press conference.
					
					 Noting they called for taking such measures as unearthing the remains of the victims but the Lee Myung Bak regime and the present authorities have not taken any measure, they charged.
					
					 We will steadily conduct the work for discovering the remains of the victims with the work for unearthing the remains of those victims related to the case of the Association of the Protected in the Jinju area of South Kyongsang Province as a starting point, thus probing the truth behind other cases of massacre of civilians, and urge the authorities to opt for doing so, the declaration stressed.

articles.title: Koreans in Uzbekistan Celebrate Day of Shining Star
articles.content:
Koreans in Uzbekistan Celebrate Day of Shining Star
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Koreans in Uzbekistan held an event on Feb. 18 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star). 
					 Present at the event were Sok Myong Son, chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans; Ju Yong Il, chairman of the "Old Men" Association for Korean Cultural Tradition in Uzbekistan; and other officials, heads of compatriots art troupes and Koreans. 
					
					 Speakers said that they are looking back with deep emotion on the undying exploits Kim Jong Il performed on behalf of the country and its people on the occasion of the Day of the Shining Star, the greatest auspicious holiday of the nation.
					
					 They referred to the fact that great development has been made in the motherland under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un as the days go by. 
					
					 They said compatriots will dynamically turn out in the patriotic movement for national reunification to carry out the tasks for reunification set forth by Kim Jong Un in his New Year Address. 
					
					 Then followed a performance given by Korean artistes there.

articles.title: Korean People's Just Cause Supported by WFTU
articles.content:
Korean People's Just Cause Supported by WFTU
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- A meeting of the Presidential Council of the World Federation of Trade Unions (WFTU) extended full support to the Korean people's just cause. It was held in Rome, Italy on February 14 and 15.
					 Adopted at the meeting was an appeal signed by delegates of trade unions of 18 countries and international and regional trade unions.
					
					 The appeal addressed to the trade unions of all countries in the world in support of Korea's reunification and peace said:
					
					 The nearly 70 year-long history of territorial division is inflicting untold disasters and sufferings upon all Koreans in the north and the south.
					
					 Such tragic and disgraceful history of the Korean nation is entirely attributable to foreign forces.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean authorities are blustering that they will soon stage Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military drills for aggression which they have done every year under the pretext of "annual" and "defensive" ones.
					
					 On January 16 the National Defence Commission (NDC) of the DPRK sent a crucial proposal to the south Korean authorities to pave the wide avenue of improving the north-south relations.
					
					 This proposal reflects the desire and demand of the whole Korean nation in the north, the south and abroad aspiring after the independent reunification, peace and prosperity of the country.
					
					 We strongly demand the U.S. and the south Korean authorities immediately stop their war drills seriously threatening peace and security on the Korean peninsula and in Asia and the rest of the world, expressing deep concerns about the projected dangerous joint military drills.
					
					 Recognizing that the crucial proposal of the NDC of the DPRK serves as the first step for ensuring peace and security on the Korean peninsula, we fully support it and urge the south Korean authorities to respond to it as soon as possible.
					
					 We ardently appeal the world working class and trade unions loving justice and peace to extend full support and solidarity to the Korean people and other working people in their just struggle for achieving reunification, peace and prosperity of the country.
					
					 A letter to supreme leader Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Cambodian King and Great Queen Send Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
articles.content:
Cambodian King and Great Queen Send Floral Baskets to DPRK Embassy
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Cambodian King Norodom Sihamoni and Cambodian Great Queen Norodom Monineath Sihanouk separately sent large floral baskets to the DPRK embassy in Phnom Penh on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The delegation of the Ministry of the Royal Palace of the Cambodian government led by Kong Sam Ol, deputy prime minister in charge of the Royal Palace, paid a congratulatory visit to the embassy and placed the large floral baskets before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Feb. 17 upon the authorization of the king and the great queen.
					
					 Kong Sam Ol asked the DPRK ambassador to convey to supreme leader Kim Jong Un the best wishes of the king and the great queen for his good health and greater success in his noble work.

articles.title: Foreigners Visit DPRK Missions in Their Countries
articles.content:
Foreigners Visit DPRK Missions in Their Countries
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- A delegation of a political party and personages of different countries visited the DPRK missions in their countries from Feb. 13 to 17 in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The delegation of the Democratic Party of Equatorial Guinea headed by its general secretary placed a floral basket before the portraits of smiling President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il and paid tribute to them.
					
					 Other foreign figures placed floral baskets and bunches of flowers before the portraits and the full-length pictures of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They were the general secretary of the Central Committee of the Nepal Communist Party (Marxist-Leninist), chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association for the Study of the Juche Idea and Songun Politics, chairman of the Study Forum for Self-Reliance of Nepal, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Bangladesh Communist Party, chairman of the Bangladesh Group for the Study of the Songun Policy, chairman of the Bangladesh-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Committee, director of the Myanmar Medical Research Institute, general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, general secretary of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Communist Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and personages of the Nigerian National Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the 72nd Birth Anniversary of Generalissimo Kim Jong Il, the People's Democratic Party of Nigeria, the Nigerian National C
					
					 ommittee for the Study of the Juche Idea and the Nigeria-Korea Friendship Association.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Russian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Carried by Russian Paper
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The full text of supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us March Forward Dynamically towards Final Victory, Holding Higher the Banner of Songun" was carried by the Russian paper Komsomolskaya Pravda on Feb. 10.
					 The work, which is a speech made by Kim Jong Un at the military parade on the occasion of the 100th birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung on April 15, Juche 101 (2012), says the 100-year history of Kim Il Sung's nation clearly proves the immutable truth that outstanding leaders assure the dignity and prosperity of the country and the nation.
					
					 It sets forth the tasks to be fulfilled to glorify the dignity of Songun Korea for all ages and successfully carry out the cause of building a thriving socialist nation. 
					
					 The paper also carried a photo of Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Austria
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Off Press in Austria
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" was brought out in booklet by the Joseph Gebauer Publishing House in Vienna, Austria on Feb. 14. 
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life devoted to the country and its people. 
					
					 It also indicates the important issues arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Bulletin for Celebrating DPRK's Anniversaries Issued in Bangladesh
articles.content:
Bulletin for Celebrating DPRK's Anniversaries Issued in Bangladesh
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Bangladesh Institute of the Juche Idea issued a bulletin "Kim Jong Il's patriotism" on Feb. 9 to mark the Day of the Shining Star (birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il) and the 40th anniversary of his proclamation of the programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 Kim Jong Il's love for the country was the most genuine and ardent, the bulletin said, and went on:
					
					 He exerted great efforts to defend socialist Korea and develop it into a thriving country.
					
					 When the imperialist allied forces extremely tightened their moves to stifle the DPRK in the late 20th century, he turned the DPRK into a world military power and impregnable fortress of socialism that any formidable enemy dares not to provoke, holding higher the banner of Songun.
					
					 He devoted himself to achieving the prosperity of the country and bringing about the happiness of the people.
					
					 Kim Jong Il's patriotism serves as the precious spiritual heritage that makes all the Korean people take the genuine road of patriotism.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Anniversary Marked by Thai Organization
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Anniversary Marked by Thai Organization
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association issued a statement on February 11 on the occasion of the 40th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's proclamation of the programme of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism.
					 The statement said:
					
					 On the occasion of this day we are looking back with deep emotion upon immortal exploits Kim Jong Il performed in comprehensively systematizing the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Kim Jong Il successfully carried out the cause of modeling the whole society on Kimilsungism and turned the DPRK into an invincible power capable of defeating any formidable enemy, holding aloft the banner of Songun in the whole period of leading the Korean revolution.
					
					 He successfully applied the political idea of Songun to the revolutionary practices and thus opened up a new era of the socialist politics and led the socialist cause of Juche and the revolutionary cause of Songun to victory. Therefore, the DPRK could win victory after victory in the confrontation with the imperialists.
					
					 The Thailand-DPRK Friendship Association firmly believes that the Korean people would eternally hold Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the sun of Songun of Juche and invariably advance along the road of independence, Songun and socialism under the leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un, holding the unfurled banner of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Different Countries
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated in Different Countries
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in Cuba, Pakistan and Bulgaria on Feb. 13 and 14 to celebrate the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (Day of the Shining Star).
					 Displayed at the venues of the meetings were photos documenting the immortal exploits of Kim Jong Il and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Also on display there were works of the peerlessly great men and books and photos introducing Songun Korea.
					
					 The first vice-chairman of the Cuban Committee for Supporting Korea's Reunification said that Kim Jong Il, who was born at the secret camp in Mt. Paektu on February 16, 1942, set store by arms from his childhood and grew up, nurturing his great will to achieve the victory of the Korean revolution with arms.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 Kim Jong Il actively aided the work of President Kim Il Sung while accompanying the President during his journeys for inspecting units of the Korean People's Army and providing on-spot guidance to different fields of the national economy.
					
					 He was a world elder statesman and peerless Songun commander who developed the Workers' Party of Korea into the invincible party and turned the DPRK into a political, ideological and military power.
					
					 The principal of Ali Ali School in Karachi, Pakistan said that Kim Jong Il was the great leader whom no one can match in terms of personality and qualification, praising him for performing undying feats for the Korean revolution and the human cause of independence.
					
					 The acting chief of the Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia, Bulgaria referred to the fact that Kim Jong Il foiled the imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK with his unique Songun politics and firmly protected the sovereignty and dignity of socialist Korea.
					
					 Kim Jong Il made immortal contributions to the movement for Korea's reunification and the struggle for defending global peace and security and achieving independence, he stressed.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Pakistan and Bulgaria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Figure of International Organization
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Exploits Praised by Figure of International Organization
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- Guy Dupre, secretary general of the International Liaison Committee for Reunification and Peace in Korea, issued a statement titled "Historical exploits of leader Kim Jong Il" on February 10 on the occasion of his birth anniversary.
					 He said:
					
					 Kim Jong Il, brilliant successor to the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung, further developed and enriched the Juche idea and the Songun idea and put forward them as the guiding idea in the era of independence.
					
					 He, staunch defender of the national sovereignty and dignity, made tireless efforts for the socialist cause, national reunification, human emancipation and world peace and security in his lifetime.
					
					 He turned the Workers' Party of Korea into the powerful party which defends the interests of the people and enjoys their trust.
					
					 He had an indomitable will to defend socialism centered on the popular masses and pursued the unique Songun politics to smash the imperialists' moves and defend the national dignity and sovereignty with arms.
					
					 Through his energetic leadership he made sure that all sectors of the national economy were updated and pushed forward with the development of science and technology so that the self-supporting economy was built on the firm foundation in keeping with the realistic requirement of the country.
					
					 He consummated the idea of Kim Il Sung on national reunification and dynamically aroused the whole Korean nation to turn out in the reunification movement.
					
					 The historic north-south summit held on June, 2000 thanks to his bold decision was the first event in the history of the division of the Korean nation.
					
					 Adopted there was the north-south joint declaration which was welcomed by the international community and is of great significance in ensuring the detente, security and peace on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The 2007 north-south summit, which is of weighty significance in the improvement of the inter-Korean relations, opened a prospect to make fresh progress in various fields.
					
					 The world peace-loving people are paying the noblest tribute to Kim Jong Il and regarding it as the just cause to take an active part in the movement for the solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.title: Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised by Swiss Organizations
articles.content:
Exploits of Kim Jong Il Praised by Swiss Organizations
 Pyongyang, February 22 (KCNA) -- The Swiss Preparatory Committee for Celebrating the Day of the Shining Star, the Switzerland-Korea Committee and the Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Switzerland made public a joint statement on Feb. 13 to mark the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il. 
					 The joint statement said:
					
					 On this anniversary we are longing for Kim Jong Il together with the Korean people. 
					
					 He was the benevolent father who regarded believing in the people as in Heaven as his motto and found himself among the dear people while providing ceaseless field guidance for their happiness all his life. 
					
					 He worked heart and soul to reunify the country. 
					
					 Through his Songun revolutionary leadership he led the anti-U.S. standoff to victory, smashing the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces' moves to stifle the DPRK. 
					
					 He, boundlessly admired by world progressives, was the great statesman who firmly defended peace in the Asia-Pacific region and the rest of the world. 
					
					 His revolutionary cause is being successfully carried forward in all fields under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: MINREX se refiere a visita a RPDC de delegacion de cancilleria china
articles.content:
MINREX se refiere a visita a RPDC de delegacion de cancilleria china
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- En relacion con la visita a Corea del viceministro de Relaciones Exteriores de China, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea dio el dia 21 la siguiente respuesta a la ACNC:
					Durante su estancia en Corea del dia 17 al 20 de febrero, la delegacion del MINREX de China encabezada por el viceministro Liu Zhenmin realizo una visita de cortesia al ministro coreano de RR.EE. y departio con los funcionarios del MINREX y de los organos correspondientes de la RPDC.
					
					En esas ocasiones ambas partes intercambiaron opiniones profundas sobre los problemas de interes mutuo, inclusive las relaciones Corea-China, la situacion regional y la reanudacion de las conversaciones a 6 bandas, y lograron el entendimiento comun.
					
					Ambas partes debatieron sobre el mayor desarrollo de la tradicional amistad Corea-China y los asuntos para ese fin, tales como intensificar este ano las visitas reciprocas de alto nivel y conmemorar con significacion el 65o aniversario del establecimiento de relaciones diplomaticas bilaterales.
					
					En lo tocante a la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana y la region, la parte china evaluo positivamente que en el ano nuevo, la parte coreana dio suficientes muestras de sinceridad para la estabilidad de la situacion y la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas a traves de las medidas importantes, y se dio destaque a la posicion de la parte coreana de que el desarrollo de la situacion en lo adelante depende de las actitudes de EE.UU. y el Sur de Corea.
					
					Ambas partes acordaron esforzarse en conjunto en el futuro tambien por la paz y la estabilidad de la Peninsula Coreana y la region y por la reanudacion de las conversaciones a 6 bandas.

articles.title: MINREX de RPDC rechaza "informe" de "comite de  investigacion" de ONU
articles.content:
MINREX de RPDC rechaza "informe" de "comite de  investigacion" de ONU
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- A la pregunta de un reportero de la ACNC formulada en relacion con que el "comite de investigacion" relativo a la circunstancia de derechos humanos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, fabricado en el Consejo de Derechos Humanos de la ONU, el portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC dio el dia 21 la siguiente respuesta:
					La RPDC nunca reconocio la existencia de aquel comite marioneta que fue organizado de manera forzada el ano pasado en la reunion del Consejo de DDHH de la ONU por Estados Unidos y sus satelites habituados al resentimiento contra la RPDC.
					
					La RPDC rechaza totalmente el llamado "informe" de ese "comite" titere, porque da espaldas al verdadero aspecto del disfrute de DDHH de nuestro pueblo y esta lleno de los datos sin fundamentos inventados para ganar dinero por la chusma tales como las fuerzas hostiles y algunos desconocidos "fugitivos norcoreanos" y criminales que huyeron del territorio patrio.
					
					Ellos libran una campana intrigante anti-RPDC instigando a la Corte Penal Internacional y al Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU bajo el pretexto de "DDHH" de la RPDC, lo cual deviene una extremadamente peligrosa provocacion politica tendente a desintegrar nuestro regimen al desacreditar la imagen de la digna RPDC y elevar el grado de presion contra esta.
					
					Ahora muchos paises y hasta algunos medios de prensa occidentales acusan aquel "informe" de prejuiciado y carente de autenticidad y se preocupan por que tal "informe" se distribuye como documento de la organizacion de la ONU.
					
					El autor que debe sentarse en el banquillo de acusado del tribunal internacional de DDHH es precisamente EE.UU., caudillo de violacion de DDHH, que causo incontable calamidades asesinando en todos los rincones del planeta a las personas inocentes y produjo escandalo por haber realizado la interceptacion y vigilancia ilegales a los habitantes de su pais y del extranjero.
					
					Seria mejor que EE.UU. apague primero el incendio de su casa en lugar de recurrir a la absurda campana de "DDHH" anti-RPDC.

articles.title: Efectuado encuentro de familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Efectuado encuentro de familiares y parientes separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea
Monte Kumgang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- Comenzo el dia 20 en este monte el encuentro entre los familiares y parientes que viven separados en el Norte y el Sur de Corea.
					Los familiares y parientes del Norte contaron a sus consanguineos del Sur que en el regazo del Mariscal Kim Jong Un, los habitantes de todo el pais viven digna y felizmente formando una gran familia armoniosa.
					
					Tras hablar de los dias enorgullecedores en que vinieron trabajando abnegadamente por la prosperidad del pais, les dijeron que ellos y sus familiares hacen gran aporte a la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista sin olvidar nunca las benevolencias de la patria.
					
					El Comite Central de la Asociacion de la Cruz Roja de la RPDC ofrecio una recepcion en honor de los participantes en el encuentro.
					
					El dia 22, los familiares y parientes del Norte y el Sur se despidieron prometiendo esforzarse por adelantar la reunificacion de la patria segun el ideal "Entre nosotros, los connacionales".
					
					Desde el dia 23, iniciara el encuentro de otros familiares y parientes.

articles.title: Publicadas en RPDC listas de electorado
articles.content:
Publicadas en RPDC listas de electorado
Pyongyang, 22 de febrero (ACNC) -- En visperas de las elecciones de diputados a la decimotercera Legislatura de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, los comites de los distritos y subdistritos electorales de todo el pais publicaron las listas del electorado.
					Todos los ciudadanos con derecho al voto que habitan en las respectivas zonas estan registrados en esas listas, elaboradas en virtud de la ley electoral de diputados a las asambleas populares de todos los niveles de la RPDC.
					
					Los electores estan confirmando la exactitud de las listas publicadas.
